item.title: Apache Sling and Jackrabbit event coming to Berlin
item.description: Apache Sling and Jackrabbit event coming to Berlin # Interested in Apache Sling and/or Apache Jackrabbit? Then you might be interested in hearing that on September 26th to 28th there will be an event in town on these two topics - mainly organised by Adobe, but labeled as community event, meaning that there will be a number of active community members attending the conference: adaptTo(). From their website: In late September 2012 Berlin will become the global heart beat for developers working on the Adobe CQ technical stack.
